name: R: Island
description:
Made in RPGMakerMV for a Game Jam about survival and resurrection, but I missed the deadline. However, I decided to get the game to a playable state even though it's missing loads of content. I might finish it one day. It's the first time I've thought of a decent plot for my games ideas.

This is a survival like game. There is a day/night cycle. Watch Health and Food status. Gather food from anywhere possible. Avoid spooks. 

Controls:

Arrow keys - to move

Enter or Z - to interact

Shift - to run 

*Hint* some trees are a food source
